scripts.build:linux: npm run build --prefix core && pkg core/dist/cli.cjs --targets node16-linux-x64 --output bin/cross-platform-tool-linux --assets prebuilds/linux-x64/sqlite3.node
scripts.build:macos: npm run build --prefix core && pkg core/dist/cli.cjs --targets node16-macos-x64 --output bin/cross-platform-tool-macos --assets prebuilds/darwin-x64/sqlite3.node
scripts.build:win: npm run build --prefix core && pkg core/dist/cli.cjs --targets node16-win-x64 --output bin/cross-platform-tool-win.exe --assets prebuilds/win32-x64/node_sqlite3_win.node
scripts.build:all: npm run build:linux && npm run build:macos && npm run build:win
scripts.build:extension: npm run build:all && npm run compile --prefix vscode-extension && npm run package --prefix vscode-extension
scripts.clean: npm run clean --prefix core && rm -rf bin/cross-platform-tool*
